//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "Gets Boma Movin' out of his cage" );

affect ( "npc_bomabeast", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_BEHAVIOR_STATE", /*@BSTATE_STRINGS*/ "BS_HUNT_AND_KILL" );
	set ( "SET_WALKSPEED", 130.000 );
	wait ( 100.000 );

	task ( "go1" )
	{
	set ( "SET_NAVGOAL", "nav1" );
	}


	task ( "go2" )
	{
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL", "nav2" );
	}


	task ( "go3" )
	{
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL", "boma_guard" );
	}



}
